title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 141.9 - School to employment programs in connection with vocational rehabilitation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 141.9 - School to employment programs in connection with vocational rehabilitation

State Regulations

School to employment programs may, with the approval of the

Commissioner of Education, be conducted by the board of education of any school
district for students who are receiving vocational rehabilitation services
pursuant to the provisions of article XXI of the Education Law. Such programs
shall conform to the provisions of section
141.8
of this Part except the

Commissioner of Education may, when required to do so in order to meet the
vocational rehabilitation objectives of the program, approve any program which
does not wholly meet such regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
141.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
